npcs.name: Dris Loth
utterances: I'm sorry, until you have chosen a specialty in your craft I do not have any work orders for you.  Come see me when you're more practiced in your trade.

npcs.name: Ieam D'Lax
utterances: In spite of the cost of living, it's still quite a popular item.

npcs.name: Lamados Dinaris
utterances: Hello, friend!  I'm here to teach interested people a little bit about how to harvest crafting materials, and how to craft tradeskilled items.  Are you interested?

Harvesting resources tend to be segregated by areas - for example, you'll be able to harvest items (often also called nodes) for making equipment for level 1-9 adventurers, in the same areas where you'll find level 1-9 adventurers hunting.  There are seven types of harvestable item:  wood, roots, ore, soft metal, animal dens, shrubs, and fish.  I'd like you to get a few harvests from each type of harvestable item.
You can find harvests for making level 1-9 items in areas where level 1-9 adventurers go to hunt.

npcs.name: Sasit Soroth
utterances: I'm sorry, until you have chosen a specialty in your craft I do not have any work orders for you.  Come see me when you're more practiced in your trade.

npcs.name: Wholesaler Zarethe N'Kor
utterances: Only traitors to the Overlord would pass up a bargain like this.  You're not a traitor, are you?
